paragraph.paragraph:
The Display window provides a view of the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject objects in your system, but unlike the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/20_layout_constructor/index.xml layout constructor and
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/60_builder_window/index.xml builder window , the objects cannot be manipulated.

This window may either be shown or hidden (default). To change between these two states, click
/images/eiffelbuild/icons/icon_display_window_color.png on the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/10_general_interface_description/20_main_toolbars.xml main toolbar , or select Show/Hide display window from the View menu.

This view is provided so that you can really see what your project will look like when it has been generated and is running as a stand alone
/libraries/vision2/00_introduction.xml EiffelVision2 system.

All properties that have been set on the
/tools/eiffelbuild/reference/02_notation.xmlobject objects in your project are set in the
/libraries/vision2/00_introduction.xml EiffelVision2 control matching its type.
